content: every time the games are on i release a freebie pattern for something that s relaxing to make while watching the action this is be this year s freebie pattern ____________________________________________ this is a relaxing to make double loop cowl using dk or similar weight yarn - the bias strip is knittd flat and then seamed for a shawl using the same stitch - game of tones /patterns/library/game-of-tones for a bandana verion - game of tones bandana /patterns/library/game-of-tones-bandana link to all my ravellenics patterns and collections link text 1 1 https //www ravelry com/bundles/ravellenics-37
